forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 8C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 46F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 34F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 41F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 36F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 42F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers in the evening. Remaining cloudy late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers of rain and wet snow in the evening. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy during the evening. A few snow showers developing late. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with a few snow showers late. Low around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 24F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the evening transitioning to snow showers overnight. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
